scripts.kr: Good to see you. What a small world.
Long time no see. How have you been?
I'm doing great. You haven't changed a bit.
scripts.en: 잘 지내고 있어. 넌 하나도 안 변했구나.

scripts.kr: Nice talking to you. Say hello to your wife.
scripts.en: 대화 즐거웠어. 와이프한테 안부 전해 줘.

scripts.kr: Catch you later. I'll keep in touch.
